action.action-desc: Mr. Whitehouse introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To make permanent the extended period of protections for members of uniformed services relating to mortgages, mortgage foreclosure, and eviction, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Foreclosure Relief and Extension for Servicemembers Act of 2015.

section.header: Making permanent extended period of protections for members of uniformed services relating to mortgages, mortgage foreclosure, and eviction
